input_text:
Job Title: Restaurant GM Saline

Location: Milan, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
To Apply for this Job Click Here

If you haven't yet had the chance to work in an esteemed establishment recognized as one of Michigan's finest workplaces for multiple consecutive years, here's your golden opportunity! We are seeking dynamic, collaborative General Managers to join our expanding team. Submit your CV today!

General Manager Benefits

 Performance-driven quarterly bonus potential of up to 10k annually First-year vacation and paid time off Comprehensive healthcare coverage, including Long & Short Term Disability, and 401K Abundant avenues for career advancement Emphasis on familial and team-centric workplace culture

General Manager Responsibilities & Requirements

 Possess 3+ years of experience as a General Manager in the fast-food industry Proven expertise in high-volume drive-thru operations Exceptional at nurturing talent and aiding in their professional growth Integrity, transparency, and a strong people-oriented ethos align with our core values, and we seek the same in candidates!

At Goodwin Recruiting we are committed to our core values. We take our value, Dedicated to Diversity & Inclusion, very seriously and will never discriminate against a candidate or client based on any protected classes. Our clients seek qualified candidates, and that is what we deliver. A person's age, gender, race, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status, or arrest or conviction record has no bearing on whether he, she, or they are able to do the job. We evaluate the knowledge, skills, and abilities that meet the requirements of the position and aim to open doors and change lives. We value all people, understanding that uniqueness and diversity foster a stronger team that is innovative and brings varying perspectives to the table. We put our money where our mouth is and are proud of our efforts to identify a broad slate of candidates, with many hiring success stories to share. JOB ID: 134890 #post

Therese Holliday

To Apply for this Job Click Here

, $60,100 - $62,000,

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
